snippet.title: Longplay of Sonic Battle
snippet.description:
Longplay of Sonic Battle, played as the NTSC version  on the Game Boy Advance. This game's version was released on Jan. 5th, 2004. Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

0:00:00 - Start
0:00:32 - Sonic story
0:46:02 - Tails story
1:36:02 - Rouge story
2:27:35 - Knuckles story
3:16:55 - Amy story
3:59:54 - Cream story
4:36:43 - Shadow story
5:25:11 - Emerl story
5:45:08 - Boss: Emerl
5:50:48 - Ending
5:54:32 - Mine Hunt

By: Reinc
